sentences.sentence: Technical specification of ion-exchange paper was provided in this parer.
sentences.translation: 本文提出了研制离子交换纸的设计技术指标。

sentences.sentence: They had gone to quite enough expense as it was, stripping the old parer off.
sentences.translation: 光是剥掉旧纸一项费用已经很可观了。

sentences.sentence: Applying period frequency spectrum method to analysis of digital seismic recording is discussed in this parer.
sentences.translation: 论述了周期-频度谱方法在分析数字化地震记录中的应用。
